title: Looking for friends to play tgt[ Fun game and positive gamer]
body:
Im looking for ppl who stay positive to preserve the peace and harmony in game for FUN and not raising ANGER.
Im no good at this game, just silv3 currently. Any elo is welcomed. 
Plz add me if u share the same attitude as me and let's have fun tgt :)
IGN: ryanlam
